name: OmniGraffle Drawing
summary: A GRAFFLE file is a drawing created by The Omni Group OmniGraffle, a macOS application used to design diagrams, charts, and other graphics. It stores one or more pages that may include text, images, drawn objects, styles, and page layout information. GRAFFLE files are used for saving and printing flow charts, sketches, network diagrams, and other drawings.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
